description:
TOCOBO Multi Ceramide Cream (50ml) combines Ceramide and Hyaluronic Acid to moisturise and strengthen the skin's barrier in harmony.
 
BENEFITS
Vegan
Cruelty free
Non-sticky finish
High density cream 
Strengthens the moisture barrier
Helps hydrate and soothe the skin by replenishing moisture 
Powerful moisturising up to 10 layers between dead skin
Safe to use even for sensitive skin
Hypoallergenic & PEG FREE
 
 STAR INGREDIENTS  
TOCOBO Multi Ceramide Cream contains:
Triple Hyaluronic Acid (10%) with different molecular sizes to provide moisture to the skin's surface. 
Multi Ceramide Complex (1,000PPM) strengthens the lipid layer, helping to form a protective membrane on the skin and prevent moisture loss.
Glycerin, which is a skin-replenishing and skin-restoring ingredient that helps to establish normal balance and hydration. It’s one of the many substances in skin that helps maintain a healthy look and feel, defending against dryness and working to maintain skin’s moisture level.
Beta-Glucan, which helps to lock hydration in and prevent moisture loss. This results in smoother and more supple skin.
Squalane – good for dry skin but also easy on acne prone skin.
Panthenol (Pro Vitamin B5) - used in skincare products as a humectant because of its ability to attract and hold moisture.
name: Tocobo 50ML
